Uses of Interface
engine.input.IAxis

  • Packages that use IAxis 
    Package Description
    engine.input
    Classes for reading and using input.

    • Uses of IAxis in engine.input

      Classes in engine.input that implement IAxis 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ButtonAxis
      Axis composed of two buttons.
      class  CompoundAxis
      Axis composed of multiple other axes.
      class  JoystickAxis
      Axis from a joystick.
      Constructors in engine.input with parameters of type IAxis 
      Constructor and Description
      CompoundAxis(IAxis[] axes)
      Creates a new axis from a list of axes.
      CompoundAxis(IAxis axis1, IAxis axis2)
      Creates a new axis from two other axes.
